msbt.message: Hey! Are you new to this island? Heh heh, me too, actually.I'm , and I'm big into fitness. Some say TOO big. Swole, even! Well, I feel like the two of us moving in at the same time means we're destined to work out together! Seriously, I hope we become bench- press besties, !

By any chance, are you the who just moved here?I knew it! I'm , the greatest dude on the island!Huh? "Greatest at what?"Greatest at putting up with muscle soreness, that's what! Anyway, see you around! .

Whoa! A new face! Just moved in, eh? Your whole bod, I mean. Not just your face. That'd be weird.I'm , and I'm 's top athlete. Great to meet you!What kind of athlete? Ha! I haven't decided yet, so I just train for everything, !

Yo! You must be . Did I hear you just moved in?I'm , the toughest guy on . When it comes to muscles, I lose to no one!I'm also awesome at coming up with workout routines, so come find me if you wanna buff up those lats!

Hhello. We haven't met, have we?My name's . I'm 's strongest <10_10 />HIYAACHOOO!<10_9 />Ugh Well, today I'm the strongest sneezer, I guess.I'm not feeling so great right now. But gimme a holler when I'm feeling better, .

Hey, do you live on this island too?My name's . Just moved to today, if you couldn't tell.Heh heh, if someone as totally ripped as you lives here, then this is definitely the right island for me!I hereby officially recognize you as a legit rival. May the buffest bud win, !

YIKES! WHO ARE YOU?!<10_9 />Oh I see You're just another -er. I never lock my door, soAnyway, let's start over. My name is , and I'm all about strength training. You really got my heart racing for a sec there, sothanks! I'm feeling that burn! Whew!Well, if you ever need a fitness rival, you got one! I'll see you around, !

Whoa! Do you live on this island? My name's . I just moved here a few days ago.I wasn't expecting to meet someone else as strong as me.But now I'm pumped! You and I can be workout buddies! Awesome to meet you, !
Well, hello! You're a new face! My name's .Wownobody told me someone as ripped as you lived hereWell, nobody outmuscles me! Hope you're ready to have a ridiculously strong island buddy!

Huh? We haven't met yet, have we?Well, my name's . I moved here not too long ago, myself.Awesome facts about me, hmm Ah! My special talent is downing protein shakes in one gulp, .I like to use brain freeze to work my eyebrow muscles. It's great staring contest training!Well, that's me in a nutshell. Hope we become good budsbud!

<10_14 arg="16" />HIYAACHOOO!<10_9 />Oh, sorry about that.You're a new face around here, yeah? My name's . I just moved hereYou caught me on a bad day though. This cold's got me feeling muscle soreness times fifty.I don't want you to catch anything, so gimme some space. We'll chat when I'm better, .

You live on this island? Nice to meet you. I'm ! recruited me here from .I was told that this place needed more muscles, so I sprinted right over! Uhswam, actually.Well, as you can see, I've got a lot of unpacking to do, but I'm sure I'll be a better conversationalist tomorrow.

Heya! Do you live on this island too?I'm Wanderer from ! I sorta gave myself that nicknameI'm sure you recognize me. I was the undisputed champ of .Anyway, invited me to move here, so I hope 's ready!

Hey, you live here too?Just moved from myself. Name's .You know ? I got invited by them, so I packed up, got on my hang glider, and here I am! I'm pretty happy so far! I'm looking forward to working out with you and the others, !

Oh! Do you live here too?I'm . I moved here from . Nice to meet ya, !Your neighbor said I should move here, so I kayaked right over!I can't wait to show off my triceps to a whole new audience. Oh, hey! If you need anything lifted, holler.

Hey, nice to meet you. I'm . invited me to move here, so I did, and <10_10 />HIYAAACHOOO!<10_9 />Ugh Sorry. I caught a cold, and I'm not feeling like myself. I'm barely even thinking about free weights!The real me is way stronger than this Be ready to face them when I'm feeling better, .

<10_14 arg="20" />HEEEEYOOOO!<10_9 />I'm ! Just moved to the island today!But the bodybuilder that invited me here seems to have moved away. Can you believe it? It's really too bad. They were SUPER built. But hey, you're pretty buff yourself!I hope you and I can be awesomely buff workout buds, .

Yo! Nice to meet you!I'm . Good to see a new face on the island.Actually, I was invited by one of the other residents, but they don't seem to live here anymore.But meeting someone like you makes me feel like moving here was a good idea after all. Your abs are granite!You and I are gonna be swole mates, I can already tell! Looking forward to spotting you, .

Umwho are you? We've never met, right?I'm . I keep the peace on this islandlike an like <10_10 />HIYAAACHOOO!<10_9 />Actually, somebody else on the island invited me to move here to keep the place safe.But that bud doesn't seem to be around anymore. And now I've caught a cold too. When I'm better, maybe we can go on patrol togetherbut till then .
Oh! Are you new to the island? I'm !Actually, I lived here before, but I moved to for a while. Now I'm back, ! I'm busy doing box lifts today, so let's hang out tomorrow!

Huh? Do you live on this island?Heh heh, I just moved here from . My name is . Nice to meet ya!So if you moved in after me, that means I've got seniority over you! Meaning YOU'D have to spot for ME!Well, I hope we can be good buddies despite that, .

Hey, are you a newbie here? I'm !I returned to this island from a strength-training tripand and<10_10 />HIYAAACHOOO!<10_9 />Oh, sorry I think I brought a cold back from my trip, .I wouldn't want to give it to you, so let's hang out when I'm better.

Yo! Thanks for coming by!I'm ! I just moved here from today!Just you wait! I'm gonna take the
scene by storm!

Huh? Do you live on this island too?I'm . I moved here from . Nice to meet you!I'm sure you figured this out already, but sports are my life. You gotta see me when I'm doing ! I feel like you and I are going to be solid competitors. Can't wait to see what you got, !

Yo! How are you?<10_4 /> Wait Who are you again? Oh, !Sorry, my head's so full of muscles that sometimes it's hard to cram another name in there.Anyway, it's nice to meet you! I'm . I came here from .Well! I bet you and I have a muscular future ahead of us, !

Oh! You live here? Nice to meet you! I moved here a while back from .The name's , and I'm mad about muscles!How mad? Well, I spent three hours yesterday flexing in front of a mirror. Sopretty mad, I guess. You're lucky though. You don't need a mirror to check out these top shelf delts, .

Um Who are you again? Huh? We've never met before?Checking up on a stranger like this That's mightymighty of you!I'm ! I moved here from . So you <10_10 />HIYAAACHOOO!<10_9 />So you live on too? Cool, .Hey, umhow about we compare muscles when I'm feeling better

Huh? You're a new face. State your name and favorite muscle group!, huh? And with those stellar biceps, I bet you're way into armsMy name's , and I'm into ALL the muscle groups, !It's nice to meet you. If you ever need a spotter for leg day, or any other muscle day, let me know.

<10_14 arg="16" /><10_10 />HIYAACHOOO!<10_9 />Ugh Excuse me.You're the new triceps around here, eh? My name's . Nice to meet youYou're catching me on a bad day though. This cold's got me feeling down for the count.I don't wanna pass anything to you, so why don't we chat after I get better, ?

You live on this island? Heh, nice to meet you. I'm !I ran into while on a day trip, and got invited to move here! I was told this place needed more muscles, so I sprinted right over! Uhswam, actually.Well, as you can see, I've got a lot of unpacking to do, but I'm sure I'll be a better conversationalist tomorrow.

Heya! Do you live on this island too? Cool. They call me , !Actually, uh I just kinda started calling myself that when I was out on a tripAnd incidentally, that trip's where I met and sorta got invited to move here.I was describing all my training, and they were like, "Why not do that on ?"And that's my story! Well, I hope everyone's ready to cheer, 'cause I'm going for the gold, !

Hey, you live here too? My name's !You know ? I met 'em AND their glorious delts on a day trip a while back.We hit it off, I got invited to move here, I packed up, leapt on my hang glider, and here I am! Just like that!It's been awesome here so far! I'm really looking forward to working out with everyone, !

Oh! Do you live here too? They call me .I met up with out on a trip. By the way, have you seen their biceps? Amazing!Well, I kept hearing how great this place was, so as soon as I got home, I packed up and kayaked on over!Ah! I cannot wait to show off my muscles to a whole new audience. If you need anything lifted, holler.

Hey, nice to meet you. I'm . invited me to move here when we were out on a day trip so— <10_10 />HIYAAACHOOO!<10_9 />Ugh Sorry. I caught a cold, and I'm not feeling like myself. I'm barely even thinking about free weights!The real me is way stronger than this Be ready to face them when I'm feeling better, .

They were super buff too. But hey, you're pretty buff yourself!I hope you and I can be awesomely buff workout buds, .

Yo! Nice to meet you! I'm . Good to see a new face on the island.I met a neighbor of yours on my last workout voyage and got invited here. But then they moved awayWell, meeting you makes me feel like coming here was a good idea after all. Your abs are granite!You and I are gonna be swole mates, I can already tell! Looking forward to spotting you, .

I'm .So, I kinda keep the peace on this islandlike anlike <10_10 />HIYACHOOO!<10_9 />Actually, I was out on a day trip when someone asked me to move here to keep the peace.But that athlete doesn't seem to be around anymore. Plus I've caught a cold and things are already peaceful. Well, when I'm better, maybe we can go on patrol together. Till then .

You live on this island? Heh, nice to meet you. I'm ! invited me here while I was visiting the campsite.I was told that this place needed more muscles, so I sprinted right over! Uhswam, actually.Well, as you can see, I've got a lot of unpacking to do, but I'm sure I'll be a better conversationalist tomorrow.

They call me , !Actually, uh I just kinda started calling myself that when I was visiting the campsiteAnd incidentally, the campsite's where I met and got invited to move here.I was describing all my training, and they were like, "Why not do that on ?"And that's my story! Well, I hope everyone's ready to cheer, 'cause I'm going for the gold, !

They were super buff. But hey, you're pretty buff yourself!I hope you and I can be awesomely built workout buds, .

Yo! Nice to meet you! I'm . Good to see a new face on the island.I met one of the other locals at the campsite, and they invited me here. Looks like they moved away, though.But meeting someone like you makes me feel like coming here was a good idea after all. Your abs are granite!You and I are gonna be swole mates, I can already tell! Looking forward to spotting you, .

Umwho are you? We've never met, right? I'm .So, I kinda keep the peace on this islandlike anlike <10_10 />HIYACHOOO!<10_9 />Actually, I was at the campsite when someone asked me to move here to keep the peace.But that athlete doesn't seem to be around anymore. Plus I've caught a cold and things are already peaceful. Well, when I'm better, maybe we can go on patrol together. Till then .

Heya! My name's . Awesome to meet you!I was muscle posing at the campsite when came by and said, "Nice abs!"Well, anyone who's a fan of abs is someone I want for a neighbor, so I moved here, !You an ab fan too? Of course you are, just look at yours! Yeah, I think we'll get along great!

Hey, have we met yet? Don't think so. I'm .I was hanging out at the campsite when swung by and did the most amazing flex.It really made an impression on me. I hadn't thought about it that way. I needed to know more, so here I am!And hey! Since we're neighbors, I'll be happy to share my flex findings with you, !
What's up? I'm . I'm kinda new here, .You know about 's team? I got recruited for it when I was at the campsite.Are you gonna be on it too? I'm all about some , so I bet we'd be awesome teammates!

Huh? Have we met? I don't think so I'm . Nice to meet you!So check this out. I was over at the campsite when challenged me to a flex-off.Well, there's no out-flexing me, so now I'm 's new personal trainer.How about you? Got any flex skills? Do you want some, ?

Hey. Have we met? My name's . Pleased t— HIYAAACHOO!Ugh You know , right? We met at the campsite, and I got invited to move here.What I didn't know was that the colds here are super buff. I just can't seem to flex 'em out of my systemTell you what. Let's hang out after my immune system bulks up. Sound good, ?

What's up, new neighbor? Ha! My name's . Nice to meet you.So I was lifting things over at the campsite—like you do—when someone invited me to live here.Well, it seems I lifted so much that I scared 'em off. I guess I didn't know my limitor theirs.Hey, you're not intimidated by lifting, right? No? Good! Then we can be friends, .

Hey! You're , right? I'm . Nice to finally meet you.So I'm a little confused. I was at the campsite when someone invited me to move here.I wanted to thank 'em for the invite, but I haven't seen them since. Think they moved away?I was gonna treat them to one of my gourmet protein shakes too. Oh well. Their loss, my gain.Anyway, let me know if you need anything lifted or bent or crushed oryou get the idea, .

<10_14 arg="16" />HIYAAAACHOOOO!<10_9 />Ugh I hate to admit it, but I think this cold's even stronger than I amHey, I'm . How's it going?I think someone invited me to move here when I was at the campsitebut I haven't seen 'em since I arrived.M-maybe it was all a fever dream? I can't tell anymore Oh well. I'm here, .Look, let's justdrop back and punt for now, and talk again once I'm well. That sound good?
